name: Mamaya
description:
Navigate an old lady through the neighborhood. 

Oh, and the aliens are here. 

Smite them with your mighty shopping bag   fisticuff action (for now)

-version 0.00001: gamepad works, WASD / mouse work.  The white things are, like, ice or something. MouseLeft smack, MouseRight run. Right trigger and A on the gamepad. 

Alt + F4 gives you the sweet release of going back to your boring day.

-this thing is in romanian, but it doesn't really matter, does it?
